other_tests.findings: Three pulmonary nodules in the right lung base, with the largest measuring 6 mm. Mild subsegmental atelectasis without pleural effusions. The appendix is significantly dilated, measuring up to 15 mm and fluid-filled, with an 8-mm appendicolith at the base. Extensive fat stranding surrounding the appendix. Multiple prominent mesenteric lymph nodes in the right lower quadrant.
